person.profile1: I am currently pursuing my first year in Computer Engineering. I am a very serious and hardworking student. During my training, I learned innovation, team-work and problem solving. My personal goal is to be as efficient as I can be.
person.profile2: Thanks to my longtime tennis practice, I developed a strong sense of competition. I also managed to express my taste for creativity through my musical passion, and my band experience as a bassist.
